data.title: Mandzukic, Wilson high on Man Utd list
data.desc: OTTAWA — The Liberals are asking Saskatchewan’s insurance industry watchdogs to investigate Conservative Leader Andrew Scheer for allegedly falsely claiming he once worked as an insurance broker in that province.

data.title: MLB Playoffs Daily: Braves-Cardinals, Nationals-Dodgers move into spotlight
data.desc: The most important thing of the day: We'll certainly be eager to see if the Nationals are able to carry the momentum from their wild-card win across the country to Dodger Stadium, but Game 1 feels particularly important for the young Braves in their return to the playoffs after being shrugged off by L.A. last year. With the red-hot Jack Flaherty waiting in the wings to start Game 2 for St. Louis, if the Cardinals can pull out a win Thursday, Atlanta will be standing on the edge of a cavernous hole
